summary.p: Does not yet consider it necessary to fulfill his promise. Recommends a housemate who would like to speak with Bullinger. Greetings.

div.p: Greetings. See, I have not yet responded to my promises; it is because I think it is not necessary. I hope you are well with the brothers.
This is my housemate, a man very eager for your name. He recently wanted to speak with you when you were here, but business prevented it. You will now give him even half an hour.
Farewell in the Lord Christ, who may guide you in His will. Amen. Greet all the brothers, greet your wife.
To Lord Heinrich Bullinger, his patron and dearest brother.
